newsitem.title: SOUTH AFRICA: Soccer-CAF to inspect Burkina Faso arrangements.
newsitem.headline: Soccer-CAF to inspect Burkina Faso arrangements.

text.p: African football president Issa Hayatou will lead a seven-man delegation to Burkina Faso on Monday to check arrangements for the hosting of next year's African Nations Cup finals.

Hayatou, president of the Confederation of African Football (CAF), and his team will inspect the stadiums in Ouagadougou and Bobo Dialassou proposed for the 16-nation tournament and medical, hotel, press and marketing arrangements.
This is the second inspection trip that CAF are making to the arid west African country, who are hosting their first major soccer tournament in February.
The delegation will also meet the local organising committee and government officials, CAF said.
